com.martensigwart.fakeload

Class RandomAccessDiskInputSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.martensigwart.fakeload.AbstractLoadSimulator
      • com.martensigwart.fakeload.DiskInputSimulator
        • com.martensigwart.fakeload.RandomAccessDiskInputSimulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoadSimulator, Runnable

    public final class RandomAccessDiskInputSimulator
extends DiskInputSimulator
    A DiskInputSimulator that simulates disk input using an underlying RandomAccessFile.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RandomAccessDiskInputSimulator

        public RandomAccessDiskInputSimulator(String filePath)
                               throws FileNotFoundException
        Parameters:
        filePath - path to the file for simulating disk input (should be bigger than amount of available RAM)
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if no file with the specified file path can be opened

      • cleanUp

        protected void cleanUp()
        Description copied from class: AbstractLoadSimulator
        Clean up method which is called if the thread executing this AbstractLoadSimulator encounters an exception, e.g. InterruptedException. This method should be used to clean up any resources that are used by the simulator for load simulation purposes.
        Specified by:
        cleanUp in class AbstractLoadSimulator
